name: At The Sea's End
description:
A puzzle adventure game made in RPG Maker VX Ace for the "My First Game Jam", and the first from the team "Fleeting Dream Games". The demo of the game was completed in only two weeks.

The story focuses on a lighthouse keeper on a quest to find all the pieces of their soul deep in the sea in order to go back home.

The game focuses on puzzles, as well as exploration to provide info on the characters and your surroundings.

The demo lasts 15 minutes averagely if you speedrun and covers up to the first puzzle!

◆ Story, Writing: ZMakesGames & Rukomura

◆ Maps, Titlescreen: ZMakesGames

◆ Eventing, Sprites: Rukomura (with additional sprites by ZMakesGames)

CONTROLS:

◆ Movement: Arrow Keys

◆ Confirm, Accept, Check Item (Menu): Z, ENTER

◆ Call Item Menu: X, ESC

◆ S Key (hold): Skip Text

◆ F5: Fullscreen

◆ F6: Zoom Window

◆ F12: Return to titlescreen (no progress saved)

More details in the read me.txt provided with the game!
